resources.string:
Hello! My name is Ivana Situmorang.
I am a final year student of Information Technology. I like creating mobile app. Now, I am learning MVVM architecture using Kotlin and Coroutine. 
I like to learn new technology, especially in Android Development. I hope I can be an Android Expert. 
Here is my contact if you want to ask something about me :

 Email		: ivana.natalia96@gmail.com
 Github		: ivanasitumorang
 Phone		: 082370924946
 LinkedIn	: ivanaazuka

This app is a news reader. This app consumes API from newsapi.org that shows top-headlines in Indonesia and consists of 3 different categories, there are Business, Technology, and Sports. 
This app could show you interesting news from NewsAPI. You can check it there. 

If you have any question, feel free to ask me in About page :)
